title: "Quit feeding"
body:
To stop dying and start outplaying the enemy, You need to have a specific personal skill level relative to your opponents.
If you start the game with a personal skill below that of your opponents and you feed them kills...
it's merely impossible to drastically increase your own skill to the point of being better than them WHILE they are fed in the middle of a game.

So next time you die 3 times in lane and your ally says "Quit feeding". you let him know that that's impossible and you continue to feed until you lose (RIGHTFULLY SO MIGHT I ADD!).
